üáÆüá≥ Our Story

Empowering India's
Small Retailers

We believe every dukandaar deserves simple, powerful technology.

Our Mission

India has over 12 million small retail shops ‚Äî kirana stores, medical shops, stationery stores, hardware shops. Most still use paper registers, manual calculations, and memory to run their business. We built Tulasi Stores to change that.

Tulasi Stores replaces paper bills, expensive POS machines, and complicated software with one beautiful app that works on any device ‚Äî even without internet.

The Problem We Solve

Real challenges faced by millions of Indian shop owners every day.

‚ùå PROBLEM

Paper bills get lost

Handwritten bills fade, tear, and get lost. No way to search past transactions or track patterns.

‚úÖ SOLUTION

Digital bills stored forever. Search, filter, export. Every transaction recorded securely in the cloud.

‚ùå PROBLEM

Udhar disputes

Customers deny they owe money. No proof, no records. Relationships break over money confusion.

‚úÖ SOLUTION

Digital khata with proof. Every udhar recorded with date, amount, and transaction history. Share on WhatsApp.

‚ùå PROBLEM

Expensive POS machines

Traditional POS systems cost ‚Çπ15,000‚Äì‚Çπ50,000. Monthly software fees of ‚Çπ500+. Too expensive for small shops.

‚úÖ SOLUTION

Runs on your existing phone. Tulasi Stores works on any Android, Windows, or web browser. No expensive hardware needed.

‚ùå PROBLEM

No internet in rural areas

Many shops in small towns and villages have unreliable internet. Cloud-only apps fail them.

‚úÖ SOLUTION

Offline-first design. Tulasi Stores works completely without internet. Syncs automatically when connection returns.

‚ùå PROBLEM

English-only software

Most billing apps are only in English. Hindi and regional language users struggle with complex English menus.

‚úÖ SOLUTION

Hindi, English & Telugu. Complete app experience in your language. Switch anytime from settings.

‚ùå PROBLEM

Manual stock counting

Counting stock by hand leads to errors. Missing products go unnoticed until a customer asks.

‚úÖ SOLUTION

Automatic inventory tracking. Stock updates on every sale. Low-stock alerts before you run out.

Our Journey

From idea to empowering thousands of retailers.

üí°
2025 ‚Äî The Idea

Seeing shop owners struggle with paper registers and expensive POS machines, we asked: "Why can't billing be as easy as sending a WhatsApp message?"

‚ö°
Jan 2026 ‚Äî Development

Built for cross-platform support ‚Äî Android, Web, and Windows. Real-time cloud sync. Designed for simplicity ‚Äî every feature tested with real shop owners.

üöÄ
Feb 2026 ‚Äî v1.0.0 Launch

POS billing, inventory management, khata ledger, sales reports. Barcode scanning, thermal printing, voice input. Hindi, English, Telugu. Available on Android, Windows, and Web.

üîÆ
Coming Next...

Multi-store management, staff accounts, advanced analytics, more languages, AI-powered insights, and much more.
